citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Science Branch - Data Analyst
citeinfo.title: Groundfish Biological Database (Canada)

descript.abstract:
Parameter Biological data on individual Groundfish sampled from the commercial and research catches on the coast of B.C.
Measurement Details Data are collected from commercial, observer, charter and research trip sampling activities. Data include information on individual specimens such as length, sex and age, in conjunction with sampling background data such as species, location and collection methodology.
Pacific Coast of Canada
Other Comments The Groundfish Biological database is not complete. At this time, historical Groundfish biological data are being added to the database.
[ A TCODE project ]

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
